MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the KY4 postcode area of Cowdenbeath. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties; our team onsite have identified a fault on the underground cable network on Main street. Repairs are ongoing in the area and we expect full power to be restored as quickly and as safely as possible by 8am. If you lose power fully in the meantime please call us back.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 2:27am on 19th January 2021
